name: Text Twist 2!!
description:
Get ready for some word-finding fun in Text Twist 2!

Use the Twist button to rearrange the letters and find more combinations.

Test your vocabulary skills and try to score as many points as possible.

Look at the jumbled letters and find all the word combinations. You need at least one six-letter word to move on to the next round.

How many rounds can you make it?
